text: AfroCan 2019 is the inaugural edition of the AfroCan, a men's basketball continental championship of Africa. Only players who play for Africa-based basketball clubs are eligible to participate. The tournament is to be hosted by Mali, from 19 to 28 July 2019. ==Venue== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" !Bamako |rowspan="4"| |- |Palais des Sports Salamatou Maïga |- |Capacity: 5,000 |} ==Preliminary round== The draw of the FIBA AfroCan 2019 took place on 13 July in Praia, Cape Verde.
